content: With the Drink equipped, each sip will recover 36% of your maximum health (a respectable amount) and boost your mana by a moderate amount. That second bonus is the strongest part, as Mana recovery can be vital to survival during some of the more challenging areas. As with all Drinks, the potency of this can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game. Our page has every one of them highlighted for you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jade_Essence.md', within the main section titled 'Jade Essence'.
The content is as follows:
With the Drink equipped, each sip will recover 36% of your maximum health (a respectable amount) and boost your mana by a moderate amount. That second bonus is the strongest part, as Mana recovery can be vital to survival during some of the more challenging areas. As with all Drinks, the potency of this can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game. Our page has every one of them highlighted for you.
